description.en:
The young actor Emoto wants to get in contact with his kouhai from university, Kurama. However, not able to get a good timing, he follows him around like a stalker day by day.
His actions irritate the popular Okama talent Chouko, who warns him not to approach Kurama anymore. Emoto, while initially defiant, reveals his true feelings after being forced to drink. Dead drunk, Emoto shows a weak, different side of him when he expresses his feelings of wanting to apologize to Kurama and at the same time he knocks Chouko out with his cuteness.

Intimidating!
Chouko switches from a woman (man-sign) to a super ikemen!
The long awaited spin off of the highly popular series Renai Fuyuki Todoki is finally here!

[b][u]Note from YaoiOtaku:[/u][/b] Inside the manga, chapter 6 is noted as Chapter 8, as the events of this chapter are a flash-forward, and take place after the following chapter (ch7). So yeah, we didn't skip a chapter, just that the author named the chapters a bit weirdly.
